io.straas.android.sdk.messaging

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable, CharSequence

    public final class Message
extends Object
implements CharSequence, Parcelable
    Provides necessary information of a message in a chatroom.
